title: Dig or Die v0.049
description:
here is the changelog of the updates I did this week (v0.047/v0.048/v0.049):

GENERAL:
- New Peaceful mode: no monster will attack you, unless you hit him first. Now you can sleep during night, at least.
- A slightly better pathfinding of the ground monsters. They should dig their path up more easily

BUG FIXES:
- Fix the "You're dead, please reload" message when not dead
- Monsters don't spawn anymore in front on backwalls (unless you try to put it everywhere!)
- Monsters don't disappear when you teleport anymore. Sorry mates :-)
- "0% loading" freeze fixed (at least for a part of the people who got the error)
- Black dogs spawn black dog horns instead of normal horns (you can now craft advanced hp potions)

BALANCE:
- Ground monsters are slowed when swimming
- Rain quantity has been reduced (from 0.15 to 0.12 )
- Damages of minigun increased from 4 to 5
- Walls HP increased (100 to 150 for concrete and metal supports, 250 to 300 for reinforced concrete)
- A little more coal, a little less aluminium (requires a new world generation)
- The day/night cycle lasts now a little longer (12min instead of 10)

GRAPHICAL:
- Draw the HP bar for damaged turrets
- Dragged items are not semi-transparent.

MINOR CHANGES:
- Reverse the item selection change when scrolling
- Add a sound to the miniaturizor
- You can now jump with the W key
- A lot of typo & grammar errors fix, and better english.
- Modification of some monsters & item names
- Framerate cap
- Cannot quick-save while dead
